As you may know, Gestion DBI is a Canadian registrered business offering diverse hosting services and IT/Telecom services. Due to the coming Canadian Holiday…(July 1st)… we decided to create special promotion for you! Just check below!

Please take note, all price below are in Canadian Dollars.

Special Packages (No promo code required):

OVZ: 1 CPU Core | 1GB RAM | 40GB HDD | 1TB @ 1Gbps | 2$/m or 20$/year - ORDER
KVM: 0.5 CPU Core | 512MB RAM | 10GB NVMe | 2TB @ 1Gbps | 20$/Semi-annually - ORDER
BSHARED: 3 domains | 10GB HDD | 10 email accounts | 250GB @ 1Gbps | 10$/year - ORDER
PSHARED: 2 domains | 10GB HDD | 30 email accounts | 500GB @ 1Gbps | 20$/Semi-annually - ORDER
RESELLER: 30 domains | 30 accounts | 20GB HDD | 500GB @ 1Gbps | 12$/Semi-annually - ORDER

OpenVZ Packages (Get 25% off recurring) Promo code: CANADADAY181):

DNS-OVZ-128 | 1 Core | 128MB RAM | 10GB HDD | 250GB @ 1Gbps | 9.75$/year - ORDER
DNS-OVZ-256 | 1 Core | 256MB RAM | 20GB HDD | 500GB @ 1Gbps | 1.50$/month - ORDER
DNS-OVZ-512 | 1 Core | 512MB RAM | 35GB HDD | 1TB @ 1Gbps | 2.25$/month - ORDER
DNS-OVZ-1024 | 2 Cores | 1GB RAM | 50GB HDD | 1.5TB @ 1Gbps | 3.38$/month - ORDER

KVM NVMe Packages (Get 30% off) Promo code: CANADADAY182):

KVM-NVMe-768 | 0.5 Core | 768MB RAM | 10GB NVMe | 1TB @ 1Gbps | 2.80$/m - ORDER
KVM-NVMe-1536 | 1 Core | 1.5GB RAM | 20GB NVMe | 2TB @ 1Gbps | 5.60$/m- ORDER

Rapid F.A.Q:

  • Promotion can’t replace an existing service. Valid only on new orders!
  • Promotion expired on July 4, 2018 at 11h59 GMT-5 or while supply last.
  • No spamming, resources abuse and illegal hosting. Read AuP and ToS for more information
  • Custom ISO is supported directly from our VMCP Panel (KVM only).
  • Payment Methods: Paypal, Credit Cards, CryptoCurrencies and Interac e-Transfer
  • Looking Glass: https://www.gestiondbi.com/en/faq
  • Support team: http://gdbi.pw/contact
